jhelp.gui.twoD

Class JHelpScrollPane2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.gui.twoD.JHelpComponent2D
      • jhelp.gui.twoD.JHelpContainer2D
        • jhelp.gui.twoD.JHelpScrollPane2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener, JHelpMouseListener

    public class JHelpScrollPane2D
extends JHelpContainer2D
implements JHelpMouseListener
    Panel that contains a big component 2D.
    To able to see all the content, scroll by dragging the mouse or use mouse wheel
    Author:
    JHelp
